attributes.action: Stop cruelty against North African Sea Penguins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year what is already a close to extinct breed of penguins are being slaughtered by the hundreds. With theses creatures being so rare now something must be done to stop this unfair cruelty towards them as they have as much right to be on this planet as anybody else

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
